about_the_game:
The official complete soundtrack of Starstruck: Hands of Time!

Features

  • All 54 tracks of original music from Starstruck: Hands of Time!
  • Total runtime of over 1 hour and 37 minutes.
  • Entire soundtrack is provided as both lossless WAV files and MP3 files.
  • All WAV and MP3 files are tagged with album metadata (track number, title, artist, etc).

Composer Credits

All tracks composed by Andrew Allanson except:
  • 01, 34: Andrew Allanson & Richard Wagner
  • 06, 20, 27: Brandon Liew
  • 35, 49: Shaun "bleepmusic" Molthop & Brandon Liew
  • 36: Christopher Salcido & Andrew Allanson
  • 42: Shaun "bleepmusic" Molthop & Andrew Allanson
  • 53: Andrew Allanson & Brandon Liew

Song Credits

"Break the Mold"
Written by Andrew Allanson
Lyrics by Niko Tsakalakos
Performed by Elsie Lovelock

"What a Wonderful Frog"
Written by Andrew Allanson
Lyrics by Niko Tsakalakos
Performed by Jose Alfaro

"Praise The Mold"
Written by Andrew Allanson
Lyrics by Niko Tsakalakos
Vocal production by Connor Warren Smith
Engineered by Daniel Weidlein (BioSoul Music)

"The Wheel of Life"
Written by Andrew Allanson
Lyrics by Niko Tsakalakos
Performed by Michael McEntee

"Enter the Center"
Written by Andrew Allanson
Lyrics by Andrew Allanson
Performed by Elsie Lovelock

Musician Credits

Musicians: Andrew Allanson, Christopher Salcido, Jose Alfaro, Brandon Liew, Shaun "bleepmusic" Molthop, Ben Karas, Cindy Yin, Dan Christian, Daniel Colalillo, Gloria Kim, Grace Kelly, Jesse Shiroma, Kevin Maa, Pierre Cornilliat, Ray Reinebach, Sam Stilwell, Songyee Han, Tom Monda, Ying-Ting Luo
